metadata.title: CVE-2021-47616 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:RDMA: Fix use-after-free in rxe_queue_cleanupOn error handling path in rxe_qp_from_init() qp->sq.queue is freed andthen rxe_create_qp() will drop last reference to this object. qp clean upfunction will try to free this queue one time and it causes UAF bug.Fix it by zeroing queue pointer after freeing queue in rxe_qp_from_init().

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
